text.div:
BC BreastSiteVS ValueSet

Topography of the breast. Codes are drawn from Snomed and correspond to ICD-O-3.

name: BreastSiteVS
title: BC BreastSiteVS ValueSet
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC)
description: Topography of the breast. Codes are drawn from Snomed and correspond to ICD-O-3.

concept.display: Nipple structure (body structure) - corresponds to ICDO3#C50.0
Structure of central portion of breast (body structure) - corresponds to ICDO3#C50.1
Structure of upper inner quadrant of breast (body structure) - corresponds to ICDO3#C50.2
Structure of lower inner quadrant of breast (body structure) - corresponds to ICDO3#C50.3
Structure of upper outer quadrant of breast (body structure) - corresponds to ICDO3#C50.4
Structure of lower outer quadrant of breast (body structure) - corresponds to ICDO3#C50.5
Structure of axillary tail of breast (body structure) - corresponds to ICDO3#C50.6
Overlapping sites (qualifier value) - corresponds to ICDO3#C50.8
Breast structure (body structure) - corresponds to ICDO3#C50.9
